{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=NTV300S |revision=L |upc=606449087369 |asin=B0096KLQN0;GB; |fcc_date=08/29/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=media streamer |fcc_id=PY312200197 |ic_id=4054A-12200197 |pcb_id=48.JP701.0GA |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT8653;MT8653GDAG; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=HY27UF082G2B-TPCB |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ1G63DFR-H9C |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, microSD Card slot |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5372 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=HDMI, A/V out, |stock_os=Linux;2.6.35; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=28:C6:8E |oui_eth=28:C6:8E }} {{TagLine|NeoTV MAX Streaming Player}} :[http://www.netgear.com/home/products/hometheater/media-players/NTV300SL.aspx Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/GPL/NTV300_V1.00.08_src.zip GPL Source code]
"48.JP701.0GA" and "2012/07/10" is silkscreened on the board. :''[[Wistron NeWeb]] Corp'' ([[WNC]]) is presumed to be the OEM.
The same FCC ID is also used for the [[Netgear NTV300S]] (NeoTV PRO).
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/multimedia-voip/multimedia-voip-reviews/31916-netgear-neotv-max-reviewed Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :RAM noted as 512MB, but this (seemingly) conflicts with the FCC photos *[http://www.devttys0.com//?s=Neo+TV Jailbreaking the Neo TV]
